deck: John Milo "Mike" Ford (April 10, 1957 â€“ September 25, 2006) was an American science fiction and fantasy writer, game designer, and poet.
description: Perhaps best known as a novelist. Plotted three issues of SteelDragon Press' Captain Confederacy.
name: John M. Ford

description: Born and raised in Trabzon Abdullah Turan started his career in the 1050's. He created comic strips for many newspapers. His most known characters are Tolga and Kara Murat whom he created with journalist Rahmi Turan.
name: Abdullah Turan

description: Currently the artist for Frank J. Barbiere's Five Ghosts.
name: Chris Mooneyham

description:
Creator, writer and artist of Brin and Talamander.

Has been producing the adventures of Brin since 1993, first on the UK self published scene and more recently in new adventures (to mark the 20th anniversary of the character) through his own websit www.talamander.com
name: Tim Brown

deck: Holly Black is best known for her children series  The Spiderwick Chronicles, but she has written a few comic books as well.
name: Holly Black

deck: Louise Hawes is an author of more than a dozen novels and several short stories.
name: Louise Hawes

deck: Todd Mitchell is a young adult author.
name: Todd Mitchell

description: Leopoldo Sanchez was born in 1948 in Spain. In the 1970s he worked for Warren Publishing. He has also been published as Leopold Sanchez.
name: Leopoldo Sanchez

description: Tony .M DiTerlizzi was born in September 6th 1969 in Los Angeles . Tony is well know working with wizards of the cost as an artist for game system like D&D's 1993 Monstrous Manual Tome , White Wolf & Magic : The Gathering Card Game , before he started Children's Books books such as The Spiderwick Chroncles & The Spider and The Fly .
name: Tony DiTerlizzi

volume_credits.name: Realms: The Roleplaying Game Art of Tony DiTerlizzi

deck: Graphic novelist, self-publisher and Dreamworks animator.
name: Jason Brubaker
